address.description: Group address(es) that shall be added or removed. Lists are allowed.

payload.description: Payload to send to the bus. Integers are treated as DPT 1/2/3 payloads. For DPTs > 6 bits send a list. Each value represents 1 octet (0-255). Pad with 0 to DPT byte length.
payload.name: Payload

type.description: If set, the payload will not be sent as raw bytes, but encoded as given DPT. KNX sensor types are valid values (see https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/knx/#value-types).
type.name: Value type
